title: Is C++ Useful in 2023?
content: C++ is an advanced language that supports various programming methods like functional, procedural, and object-oriented programming. It is a fast language; its compile-time and execution time is faster than other programming languages. Some programming languages are also faster than C++. Still, like C++, they are not close to the machine code, as it is an intermediary language, so big organizations rely on C++ for fast speed with lesser resources.
metadesc: C++ is an advanced language that supports various programming methods like functional
